mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvZoneChrge Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , ZONE_TURN , GOD_MIN_WT , GOD_MAX_WT , OVSEA_DLV_CST , USE_YN , SLR_IMPT_RTGOD_DLV_CST , SLR_IMPT_EXCHG_DLV_CST , BUYER_IMPT_RTGOD_DLV_CST , BUYER_IMPT_EXCHG_DLV_CST , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_ZONE_CHRGE WHERE 1 = 1 AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND ZONE_TURN = #{zoneTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND GOD_MIN_WT = #{godMinWt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
